edu.illinois.mitra.starl.motion

Class MotionParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.motion.MotionParameters

  • public class MotionParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    A MotionParameters object contains settings describing speeds and options to use in motion.
    See Also:
    RobotMotion, MotionAutomaton_Drone, MotionAutomaton_Ground

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int ARC_EXIT_ANGLE
      (Degrees) If, while arcing, the angle to goal exceeds this value, the automaton will stop arcing and turn in place to face the goal.
      int ARC_RADIUS
      The maximum distance at which arcing motion will be used
      int ARCANGLE_MAX
      (Degrees) The maximum angle at which the automaton will begin traveling in arcs (if arcing is enabled)
      int ARCSPEED_MAX
      (mm/sec?) The maximum speed when arcing
      int AUTOMATON_PERIOD
      (Milliseconds) The update rate of the automaton
      MotionParameters.COLAVOID_MODE_TYPE COLAVOID_MODE
      Sets the collision avoidance mode.
      int COLLISION_AVOID_BACKTIME 
      int COLLISION_AVOID_STRAIGHTTIME
      (Milliseconds) When avoiding collisions, the maximum length of time to travel forwards for after turning to avoid a robot
      int COLLISION_AVOID_TURNTIME 
      boolean ENABLE_ARCING
      Enable/disable arcing motion
      int GOAL_RADIUS
      The minimum distance between the center of the robot and the goal position that must be achieved.
      int LINSPEED_MAX
      (mm/sec?) The maximum speed when traveling in a straight line
      int LINSPEED_MIN
      (mm/sec?) The minimum speed when traveling in a straight line.
      int ROBOT_RADIUS
      (Centimeters?) The radius of the robot, used for collision detection and avoidance
      int SLOWFWD_RADIUS
      The distance at which the automaton will begin decelerating from LINSPEED_MAX TO LINSPEED_MIN.
      int SLOWTURN_ANGLE
      (Degrees) The angle at which the automaton will begin decelerating from TURNSPEED_MAX to TURNSPEED_MIN
      int SMALLTURN_ANGLE
      (Degrees) The maximum allowable angle of error between the direction of motion and the direction to the goal.
      boolean STOP_AT_DESTINATION
      If false, the robot will continue whatever motion was in progress when the destination is reached
      int STRAIGHT_ANGLE
      (Degrees) When arcing, the maximum angle to goal at which straight motion will resume.
      int TURNSPEED_MAX
      (Degrees per second?) The maximum allowable speed when turning in place
      int TURNSPEED_MIN
      (Degrees per second?) The minimum speed when turning in place.

    • Field Detail

      • TURNSPEED_MAX

        public final int TURNSPEED_MAX
        (Degrees per second?) The maximum allowable speed when turning in place

      • TURNSPEED_MIN

        public final int TURNSPEED_MIN
        (Degrees per second?) The minimum speed when turning in place. In place turns will "ramp down" to this speed when approaching the goal

      • LINSPEED_MAX

        public final int LINSPEED_MAX
        (mm/sec?) The maximum speed when traveling in a straight line

      • LINSPEED_MIN

        public final int LINSPEED_MIN
        (mm/sec?) The minimum speed when traveling in a straight line.

      • GOAL_RADIUS

        public final int GOAL_RADIUS
        The minimum distance between the center of the robot and the goal position that must be achieved.

      • SLOWFWD_RADIUS

        public final int SLOWFWD_RADIUS
        The distance at which the automaton will begin decelerating from LINSPEED_MAX TO LINSPEED_MIN.

      • SMALLTURN_ANGLE

        public final int SMALLTURN_ANGLE
        (Degrees) The maximum allowable angle of error between the direction of motion and the direction to the goal.

      • SLOWTURN_ANGLE

        public final int SLOWTURN_ANGLE
        (Degrees) The angle at which the automaton will begin decelerating from TURNSPEED_MAX to TURNSPEED_MIN

      • ROBOT_RADIUS

        public final int ROBOT_RADIUS
        (Centimeters?) The radius of the robot, used for collision detection and avoidance

      • STRAIGHT_ANGLE

        public final int STRAIGHT_ANGLE
        (Degrees) When arcing, the maximum angle to goal at which straight motion will resume.

      • ARC_EXIT_ANGLE

        public final int ARC_EXIT_ANGLE
        (Degrees) If, while arcing, the angle to goal exceeds this value, the automaton will stop arcing and turn in place to face the goal.

      • ARC_RADIUS

        public final int ARC_RADIUS
        The maximum distance at which arcing motion will be used

      • STOP_AT_DESTINATION

        public final boolean STOP_AT_DESTINATION
        If false, the robot will continue whatever motion was in progress when the destination is reached

      • ENABLE_ARCING

        public final boolean ENABLE_ARCING
        Enable/disable arcing motion

      • ARCSPEED_MAX

        public final int ARCSPEED_MAX
        (mm/sec?) The maximum speed when arcing

      • ARCANGLE_MAX

        public final int ARCANGLE_MAX
        (Degrees) The maximum angle at which the automaton will begin traveling in arcs (if arcing is enabled)

      • AUTOMATON_PERIOD

        public final int AUTOMATON_PERIOD
        (Milliseconds) The update rate of the automaton

      • COLAVOID_MODE

        public final MotionParameters.COLAVOID_MODE_TYPE COLAVOID_MODE
        Sets the collision avoidance mode. Options are:
        USE_COLAVOID - use the standard collision avoidance algorithm
        STOP_ON_COLLISION - stop if a collision is imminent and don't resume until the blocker moves
        BUMPERCARS - ignore collision detection and just keep going no matter what

      • COLLISION_AVOID_STRAIGHTTIME

        public int COLLISION_AVOID_STRAIGHTTIME
        (Milliseconds) When avoiding collisions, the maximum length of time to travel forwards for after turning to avoid a robot

      • COLLISION_AVOID_BACKTIME

        public int COLLISION_AVOID_BACKTIME

      • COLLISION_AVOID_TURNTIME

        public int COLLISION_AVOID_TURNTIME
